properties.areaDesc: Humboldt County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; Northern Elko County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 31 at 3:05PM PST until February 2 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Elko NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected with the passage of a strong cold front
Sunday moring and afternoon. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3
inches expected in valleys with 3 to locally over 6 inches in
the mountains. Winds gusting 35 to near 50 mph along and behind
the front.

* WHERE...Humboldt County, Northern Elko County, Northern Lander
County and Northern Eureka County and Southwestern Elko County.

* WHEN...From 7 AM to 10 PM PST Sunday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A band of heavier Snow showers and gusty
winds will accompany the passage of a strong cold front which
will produce a quick one to three inches of snowfall along with
blowing snow and intervals of reduced visibility. Slippery road
conditions are expected to develop Sunday afternoon and evening
as temperatures fall below freezing.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory snow means adverse winter conditions
will impact road and air travel. Expect limited visibilities at
times with roads becoming snow covered and slippery, especially
in higher elevation summit and pass areas.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 10 PM PST SUNDAY
